body: I still need to get used to the sudden westernized names, also did anyone notice that the more innocent the main characters are in the adult manhwa the more likely they could get laid unlike the dirty minded main characters? So yeah, I do find this gullible main character very interesting. My parents would kill me if I was this gullible lol.
Goddamn frick it screw her and all of the family even the father too you gotta add him to the harem too
